caseTitle: Rafaqat Ali v. Chief Secretary, Government of the Punjab, Lahore and others
tagline: Discussion: (1) Section 20 & 26 of Punjab Technical Education & Vocational Training Authority Act, 2010 (2) Section 16 & 19 of Punjab Employees Efficiency, Discipline and Accountability Act, 2006. (3) For deciding appeal, Service Tribunal is deemed to be a Civil Court and has the same powers as are vested in such court.
